file.name: inputSEGFileName
file.label: SEG file name
file.description: File name of the SEG object.

integer.name: segmentIdToShow
integer.label: Segment selector
integer.description: Select the segment number to examine. Numbering starts from 0. -1 will result in all segments to be dumped.

integer.name: frameNumberToShow
integer.label: Frame selector
integer.description: Select the frame number to examine. Numbering starts from 1. -1 will result in all frames for the selected segment to be dumped.
